name: Queen dress up in frozen land
name_original: Queen dress up in frozen land
description:
- Dress up your princess with over 100 outfit combinations (dresses, handbags, shoes, jewelry, hairstyles, makeup, bright colors ...).
- A variety of settings.
- Paint and color up your princess.
- Share your creations with your friends or save them to your collection.
- Test your memory with the Memory Game
- Have fun with the various jigsaw puzzles
- Fun arcade games!
- Totally free.

Tap Tap Tales also has other applications such as Hello Kitty, Maya The Bee, Smurfs, Vic The viking, Shaun the Sheep, Tree Fu Tom, Heidi and is coming a new Caillou.

Children’s security is very important to us.
All of our apps include parental control to avoid accidental purchases. Our apps guarantee a child-appropriate content and include no advertising by third parties.
Our content is designed for children 2 to 8 years of age and meets all the legal requirements of user protection.
